script.name: !ship.cmd.drone.scanships
script.description: Ship Command: Drone carrier, scan ships

line.comment: * Check ships currently being chased are still nearby. Remove if not. "Nearby" means the ship is still in the sector or an adjacent sector and not docked.

sval.val: Ship Command: Drone carrier, scan ships
Check ships currently being chased are still nearby. Remove if not. "Nearby" means the ship is still in the sector or an adjacent sector and not docked.
